description: The Scottish airline is stepping in to operate flights between the Isle of Man and Liverpool.
title: Loganair takes on former Isle of Man Flybe flights to Liverpool
title_page: Loganair takes on former Isle of Man Flybe flights to Liverpool - BBC News
maintext: He said: "I have put Liverpool top of the list of destinations even though Easyjet also operate the route because of the needs of the patient transfer service.
